improvements.name: Enhanced Pin Detection
improvements.description: Add pin awareness to evaluation function

changes: Add _detect_pins() method to identify pin patterns
Penalty for pieces caught in pins (-30-80cp)

improvements.name: Tactical Move Ordering
improvements.description: Prioritize forcing moves in search ordering

changes: Higher priority for checks (+200 ordering bonus)
Higher priority for captures of valuable pieces (+150 bonus)
Prioritize moves creating threats to valuable pieces (+100 bonus)
Special handling for moves that attack multiple pieces (+120 bonus)
implementation.risk: Very Low - just reordering, not changing search

improvements.target_improvement: +3-5% overall accuracy through better move prioritization

improvements.name: Adaptive Time Allocation
improvements.description: Give more time to complex tactical positions

changes: Detect tactical complexity (piece activity, material imbalance)
Increase time allocation by 20-40% for complex positions
Emergency extension for positions with high evaluation swings

implementation_order: 1. Tactical Move Ordering (lowest risk, quick win)
3. Adaptive Time Allocation (highest impact, most complex)
